description:
Step into the cold, snow, rain or ice for mid- to long-distance runs over technical terrain. The Bushido II feature a wrap-around TPU frame, creating a precise, stable run without the need for heavy stabilizers.

  • Breathable air mesh upper with TPU reinforcements in high-wear areas
  • Gore-Tex Invisible Fit membrane keeps snow and water out
  • TPU toe cap cushions impacts and adds durability
  • Gusseted tongue keeps your feet debris-free
  • Compression-moulded EVA midsole with Stability Control System provides a cushioned and stable ride in uneven terrain
  • Forefoot rock plate protects against trail bumps
  • FriXion XT 2.0 is durable and grips all types of terrain
  • Rounded lugs around sole edge help maintain stability on uneven trails
name: La Sportiva Bushido II Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
